description: After determining your Action Points at the beginning of a round, you double them, but you also have to spend twice the amount of AP for all actions.
To determine your Action Points at the beginning of a round, roll 2d6 and choose one result.
Increase your Action Points passively by +5.
You gain +1 Action Point, +2 Speed and +2 pool bonus when you attempt to dodge or parry.
As above, and you gain a free trigger on dodges, parries and melee attacks.

As above, and you may now attempt to parry ranged attacks if you wield a suitable melee weapon, but can only do so up to two times per round.

A successful Riposte will ricochet the bullets back at any target within range 10 of you, for half the damage.
You gain +1 Soak.
You gain +1 Soak and reduce the pool modifier from accumulated injuries by 4 (to a minimum of 0).
You reduce all incoming damage by 2 before applying any other factors (even your usual Soak or qualities like Penetrating).
Allows to connect the brain to compatible devices. Being directly linked to a piece of equipment (like a vehicle) provides a +1 pool bonus.

Allows to connect the brain to compatible devices. Being directly linked to piece of equipment provides a +1 pool bonus.

The Beta variant prevents any Biofeedback damage that directly results from the linked device.
Allows to record what you see or overlay your vision with certain feeds or visual aids.
As above, but you can now zoom up to 16x, or even apply filters that go beyond human vision (like thermal, infrared, ultraviolet).
Removes the necessity for Smarteyes to be connected to gun's smartlink through a wireless signal, making it prone to be hacked. The Smartlink creates a direct connection that is unhackable.
Increases your maximum health by +3.
As above, and additionally you become immune to losing your limbs from regular combat-related outcomes.
Grants +1 Agility.
Grants +1 Agility and Constitution.

Replaces one arm with a visible cybernetic variant. When using that arm, you gain +1 Strength.
You may install up to one pistol-sized firearm 1-handed melee weapon or tool that can retract from within the internals - you have to pay for the weapon or tool seperately.
As above, but you gain +2 Strength with that arm instead.
As above, but the arm is now looking natural, and is nearly impossible to detect as being cybernetic with the naked eye.
Replaces both legs with visible cybernetic variants. Grants +2 speed and +2 pool bonus on all physical tests where your legs are heavily involved, mostly running, jumping and landing.

As above, but another +1 speed.

Additionally, you can jump twice as high or far as a normal human.
As above, but the legs are now looking natural, and are nearly impossible to detect as being cybernetic with the naked eye.
Can be triggered once per day. If you do so, you may ignore the effects of one wound up to severity 3 for 5 minutes. You also regain one edge point.
Can be triggered once per day. If you do so, you may ignore the effects of one wound up to severity 5 for 20 minutes, or remove unconsciousness. You also regain one edge point.

A cyberdeck mostly to be used as a Computer or for hacking. You need to choose and separately pay for a cyberdeck model which is then implanted. Detecting such a deck is a difficult task (as they often come out as mere Neural Links in cursory scans).

When using an internal Cyberdeck, all hacking attempts generate a free trigger.
As above, but you also gain +1 pool bonus on hacking and +20% device integrity.
You gain +5 pool bonus for your nightly regeneration, and regain 40% instead of just 20% of your health.
You gain +3 pool bonus for your natural regeneration, but you may roll for it once every 6 hours, even if you don't rest.
As above, but you may roll every hour instead. As a drawback, surgery on you suffers a -4 pool penalty and drugs don't have any effect. You also need to eat twice as much.
Your lungs filtrate hazards and pollutants out of the air, and provide you with a 30 Minute buffer before these become dangerous to you. You also gain a 10 Minute long lasting emergency oxygen tank.
You become fully immune to airborne pollutants or hazards, and you gain a 30 Minute long lasting emergency oxygen tank.
You don't need to breathe anymore, but your body needs access to oxygen at least once every 24 hours.

Allows you to alter your mood as you wish, including the simulation of drug like effects. In turn, you can hide fear, induce confidence and similar.

You gain +1 pool bonus for all related checks, including social ones like Con Arts or Command.
As above, and grants +1 Coolness.
Grants +1 Intelligence.
Grants +2 Intelligence, but the device becomes prone to deal biofeedback damage to you in case someone hacks you.

Allows you to insert a single chip at any given time. Each chip corresponds to a skill, and puts that skill to level 3 (regardless of your own levels). If your own level in the skill is equal or higher, you gain +1 skill level instead. Changing a chip is an action that costs 5 AP.

Chips are sold separately at rarity 4 and 500 Credits each.
As above, but you can install up to two chips at once.
As above, and you gain +1 Education.
Makes your outer body layer resistant to the effects of the vaccuum for up to 30 Minutes.
Makes your outer body layer resistant to the effects of the vacuum indefinitely.
As above, and allows you to withstand extreme weather (heat, cold or corrosion) for up to 30 Minutes - you still need to ensure a suitable oxygen intake.
Grants +1 pool bonus to all social checks when trying to manipulate others within range 5.

As above, and once per day you can release a cloud of strong pheromones within range 5. You can attempt an Con Arts or Command check, and victims have to pass a Survival or Empathy check with more successes than you. If they fail, they will temporarily follow your request.

Implants a bomb in the target's head that can be detonated by broadcasting a special encrypted signal.
It explodes with the profile of a frag grenade with 2 Triggers.

Implants a bomb in the target's head that can be detonated by broadcasting a special encrypted signal.
It explodes with the profile of a rocket launcher and as if 2 Triggers had been rolled for each of the trigger options.

Implants a bomb in the target's head that can be detonated by broadcasting a special encrypted signal. The implant merely shows as a Neural Link in cursory cyberware scans.
It explodes with the profile of a small tactical nuke, dealing 30 damage to everything in a 50 square radius (and half that damage for every 50 squares after that).
